Chivtron Base

The shields pulse blue where missiles hit.  Auto guns warming up to
fire another round..

::Grounded/Axis/Seekker/Lokk::
Grounded sees Windlord and the all the others.. He hooks up Lokk and
his group the the computer and inserts thier codes.
Tehy join together and burn it out of base.  Axis transforms and fire
two rockets at Sharpedge.  Meanwhile Lokk and Seekker stay in
hovercraft mode firing thier miniguns at hurricane.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: It's fine Soulstice.
>
> :::Sharpedge/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Wheeljack:::
>
> ::The Sharpedge and Banzai-Tron reach the Chivtron base::
> Banzai-tron: hey! Ive been here!
> Sharpedge: you have?
> Banzai-tron: yeah, i killed some babe and her boyfriends.
> ::Sharpedge smiled::
> Sharpedge: i like your style dude!
> ::Sharpedge fires 2 missles at the Chivtron base.  Banzai-Tron also
fires two
> missles::
> Banzai-tron: WHACK FOR MY DADDY-O!
> Sharpedge: You like Metallica too?
> Banzai-Tron: Yep.
> Sharpedge: Cool.
> ::the two sadistic bots laughed maniacally as the attacked the
Chivtron base::
